item.title: How to Modify Template in Proxmox Ve
item.author: Author
item.description: How to Modify Template im Proxox VE Sometime I wonder how to convert template back to vm and modify it and convert it back to vm? Here is the solution Convert Template to VM Delete template: 1 in vm config. 1 sed -i 's/template:\ 1//g' /etc/pve/qemu-server/{vm-id}.conf Change access permission of VM disk 1 2 3 cd /var/lib/vz/images/1{VM-ID}/ chattr -i * chmod 755 * Then covert it back to template
